DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate clinically recommend dose AG-013736 ( Axitinib ) Japanese patient review safety AG-013736 ( Axitinib ) follow single multiple dosing .
DOC.brief_title: Study Of AG-013736 ( Axitinib ) In Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Patients histologically cytologically diagnose advanced malignant solid tumor Patients standard therapy effective , suitable therapy Central lung lesion involve major blood vessel Patients treat bevacizumab VEGFR inhibitor ( )
